steps.title: Find a Safe Location
steps.description: Find a flat, stable, and safe location to change your tire. Avoid soft ground and hills.

steps.title: Turn on Your Hazard Lights
steps.description: Turn on your hazard lights to alert other drivers that you are changing your tire.

steps.title: Apply the Parking Brake
steps.description: Apply the parking brake to prevent your car from rolling while you change the tire.

steps.title: Place Wheel Wedges
steps.description: Place wheel wedges against the tires opposite of the flat tire to prevent rolling.

steps.title: Remove the Hubcap or Wheel Cover
steps.description: Use a lug wrench to remove the hubcap or wheel cover from the flat tire.

steps.title: Loosen the Lug Nuts
steps.description: Loosen the lug nuts on the flat tire, but do not remove them completely.

steps.title: Lift the Vehicle
steps.description: Use a jack to lift the vehicle off the ground, ensuring it is stable and secure.

steps.title: Remove the Flat Tire
steps.description: Fully remove the lug nuts and take off the flat tire from the wheel hub.

steps.title: Mount the Spare Tire
steps.description: Place the spare tire onto the wheel hub and hand-tighten the lug nuts.

steps.title: Lower the Vehicle
steps.description: Carefully lower the vehicle back to the ground using the jack.

steps.title: Tighten the Lug Nuts
steps.description: Use the lug wrench to tighten the lug nuts on the spare tire in a star pattern.

steps.title: Replace the Hubcap or Wheel Cover
steps.description: Put the hubcap or wheel cover back on the spare tire.

steps.title: Lower the Vehicle Completely
steps.description: Lower the vehicle completely and remove the jack.

steps.title: Check the Tire Pressure
steps.description: Check the tire pressure of the spare tire and adjust as needed.

steps.title: Stow Your Equipment
steps.description: Stow your equipment back in the vehicle and ensure everything is secure.

steps.title: Drive to a Service Station
steps.description: Drive to a service station to have the flat tire repaired or replaced.
